sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts M4/M249 Tables 4/5 and Night IVO RNG 123 NLT 06 2359 DEC2024 IOT qualify all soldiers on weapons in preparation for SQDLFX and collective training
Bull Thunder M4/M249 RNG 123
COMMANDERS
sections.PURPOSE: Prepare Troop for SQD LFX and further collective training
sections.END STATE:
80 Bull Troopers Qualified in M4 and 40 M249, No casualties
TRAINING OBJECTIVES:
Bull Troopers can accurately and quickly engage the enemy using the M4 Carbine
Bull Troopers can accurately and quickly engage the enemy using the M249 Automatic Rifle
Concurrent Task 2
sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
Planning: LT Smith plan and resources backside support for the range, RSO plans the training in accordance with IWITS strategy
Preparation: On 19NOV RSO back briefs CPT Johnson the training plan during rehearsal and SL’s train the trainer (TL’s) at the range
sections.EXECUTION:
Rifle Teams zero (Table 4), and conduct Table 5 (Practice) then conduct Night Qual. They will conduct Table 6 day at the next range.
Recovery: Participants collect ammo and clean the range. Range is closed out.
sections.TASKS:
TO SUBS:
SGT Hogarth creates training CONOP NLT 15NOV2024
SGT Hogarth Rehearses Range plan NLT 19NOV2024 IOT coordinate resources and train the trainer
CORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
Rehersal of Concept 26NOV (With Dakota)
sections.COMMAND AND SIGNAL:
P: TSM Radios
A: FM Radios
